attributes.action: Open a Motorcross track in Hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are putting together a petition to try and get somewhere to ride our motorcross bikes and quads.
There is know where in this area for us to do so.
There is quiet a few of us that went to a field but it is now private property and there are only farmers fields and private land where we are not able to keep our hobbies going.
I think this would be a good way to keep youngsters and adults out of trouble and off the streets.
This is something that people of all ages enjoy but would have to travel miles and is not practical.
Please sign this if you would be interested.
